Detailed Description

template<size_t stack_capacity = 512, class TChar = char>
class stack_string< stack_capacity, TChar >

Stack string implementation.

Internal buffer located on stack. Growing the string beyond the stack capacity will transparently overflow onto the heap.

Definition at line 24 of file stack_string.h.
